about_the_game:
"SoundKilla" is a captivating game set in the Caribbean Sound Clash culture, where the player embarks on a mission to help their mother raise money to prevent eviction due to mortgage payment problems. The gameplay involves collecting dubplates across a diverse map, engaging in tasks related to building a sound system, DJing, and overcoming challenging bosses to progress through the game. The unique setting of the game, situated between a city and an island, adds depth and richness to the player's experience.
This game promises an immersive journey through the vibrant world of Caribbean music and sound systems, offering players a blend of storytelling, music collection, and strategic gameplay elements. With its thematic focus on sound clash culture and the protagonist's quest to save their home, "SoundKilla" presents an engaging narrative intertwined with gameplay mechanics that will keep players entertained and challenged throughout their gaming experience.

content_descriptors.notes: The depicted violence in this game comes from the player defeating enemy bosses. The player is tasks to eliminate the enemy. There is gun violence and melee violence. Any depiction signs or symbols in the game that may deemed offensive is not intended to offend or promote any form of racism or bigotry.

This game promises an immersive journey through the vibrant world of Caribbean music and sound systems, offering players a blend of storytelling, music collection, and strategic gameplay elements. name: SoundKilla

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Quad-core Intel or AMD, 2.5 GHz or faster
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Any DirectX 11 or 12 compatible card.
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 22 GB available space
  • Sound Card: n/a
  • VR Support: n/a
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: SoundKilla a game steeped in Caribbean Sound Clash culture. Succeed by collecting dubplates, mastering DJ skills and conquering formidable bosses. Set against a backdrop of cityscapes and tropical islands, this game offers a unique blend of music, strategy and storytelling from start to finish.
